alert.note: Alert for Otero (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 2:22PM MDT until July 22 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: The National Weather Service in El Paso has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Otero County in south central New Mexico... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 222 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Ruidoso Downs, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Otero County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
